TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SelectionTypes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines identifiers that indicate the type of a selection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Components of a designer document can be selected using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService.SetSelectedComponents%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService>. Some types of actions can operate on a selected component or group of selected components. The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService> keeps track of the selection type of the current selection. These selection type identifiers indicate whether the selection was completed using a single click, a mouse down or mouse up selection, whether the selection should replace the previous selection, or use the default selection mode.
Use the SelectionTypes enumeration to specify the type of a selection when setting a new selection using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService.SetSelectedComponents%2A> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Add = int32(64)

Docs.summary: Represents an add selection that adds the selected components to the current selection, maintaining the current set of selected components.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Auto = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Represents a regular selection. The selection service responds to the CTRL and SHIFT keys to support adding or removing components to or from the selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Click = int32(16)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use SelectionTypes.Primary instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Represents a selection that occurs when a user clicks a component. If the newly selected component is already selected, it is promoted to be the primary selected component rather than being canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes MouseDown = int32(4)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. It is no longer supported. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Represents a selection that occurs when the user presses on the mouse button while the mouse pointer is over a component. If the component under the pointer is already selected, it is promoted to become the primary selected component rather than being canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes MouseUp = int32(8)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. It is no longer supported. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Represents a selection that occurs when the user releases the mouse button immediately after a component has been selected. If the newly selected component is already selected, it is promoted to be the primary selected component rather than being canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Normal = int32(1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use SelectionTypes.Auto instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Represents a regular selection. The selection service responds to the CTRL and SHIFT keys to support adding or removing components to or from the selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Primary = int32(16)

Docs.summary: Represents a primary selection that occurs when a user clicks on a component. If a component in the selection list is already selected, the component is promoted to be the primary selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Remove = int32(128)

Docs.summary: Represents a remove selection that removes the selected components from the current selection, maintaining the current set of selected components.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Replace = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Represents a selection that occurs when the content of a selection is replaced. The selection service replaces the current selection with the replacement.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Toggle = int32(32)

Docs.summary: Represents a toggle selection that switches between the current selection and the provided selection. If a component is already selected and is passed into <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ISelectionService.SetSelectedComponents%2A> with a selection type of Toggle, the component selection will be canceled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.SelectionTypes Valid = int32(31)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use Enum class methods to determine valid values, or use a type converter. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Identifies the valid selection types as Normal, Replace, MouseDown, MouseUp, or Click.
